sentences.en: Consciousness or cerebration has been said to have emerged in the evolution of higher primates.
sentences.cn: 据说意识或思考在较高级灵长类的进化中已出现.

sentences.en: Study philosophy and learn cerebration : train yourself to examine every concept, every truth.
sentences.cn: 研读哲学，学会思考：训练自己去检验每一个概念和事件的真伪。

sentences.en: We should attend to the image in the expressional dimension has more abundant cerebration.
sentences.cn: 我们应该关注影像于表现的层面上有更丰富的思考。

words.tran_cn: 思考；精神活动；[心理]脑髓作用

trans.tran_en: the act of thinking; consideration; thought
